document_description: This document presents Australia's strategy to to accelerate development and commercialisation of low emissions technologies. By focusing on government investment, it aims to make low-carbon technologies' cost "about the same as" existing high emission technologies. The government announced $1.9 billion in funding alongside LETS 2020. Since the release of LETS 2020, the government has announced a further $1.7 billion in funding to support LETS 2021 initiatives and the roadmap.The yearly LETS statement announces funding directed to each technology, such as hydrogen, aluminium, CCS and livestock supplements.
